personal.name: Casey P. Sullivan
personal.objective: To make the potentially boring fun with simple and informative user experience design using interesting technologies

positions.title: Head of Product Design
positions.description: Tools, assets and strategies for car dealers to interface with their customers focsuing on tailored car payments
duties: Designed and implemented illumiQUOTE, a React-based SPA for car shoppers to browse a car dealership inventory by payment, taking into account a shoppers trade, credit, location and incentive elegibility
Designed and implemented WEBSITEiQ, a lightweight vanilla JS universal website plugin to display accurate car payments on dealer website search results pages and vehicle details pages
Designed and implemented custom email templates using clojure and hiccup to be used with targeted upgrade offer campaigns for existing dealership customers
Collaborated with industry experts and provided UX expertise to develop new car shopping workflows focused on lead conversion
Developed browser extensions used by our support team to ensure correct installation of our tools inside of third-party client CRMs

positions.title: User Experience Designer/Developer
positions.description: Hardware and software solutions for automated threat detection of rogue, misconfigured, and unauthorized wired and wireless devices in and around physical locations
duties: Lead design and development of next-gen React-based SPA provied to customers to manage devices and review threats on their networks
Designed and implemented high-level executive focused report cards to easily digest security health
Ran product demos of our solutions and gathered saled leads at trade shows
Provided support and maintence of Ember JS based legacy client apps
Particpated in constant code reviews and information disemination to facilitate team growth

positions.title: User Interface Developer
duties: UI/UX developer and designer for DT CRM, the fastest growing automotive CRM in the US
Designed and developed the Dealer.com Pencil Tool, a realtime car payment engine
Developed embedable js apps designed to augment existing apps without backend integrations
Met face-to-face with our dealership customers for demos and feedback
Created SFA, an internal CRM for in-house sales teams using Grails

positions.title: Interactive Developer
duties: Senior PHP developer for one of the most established web firms in Burlington
Maintenance and additional development on 40+ existing client sites
Research of new and progressing technology for integration into existing products
Consulting on CSS and JS possibilities for design projects
Prototyping next generation of in-house CMS system in Ruby on Rails

positions.title: Manager Software + Analytics
duties: Lead Ruby on Rails developer for one of the premier Google Analytics Authorized Consultancies
Led development of SiteScan and AnalyticsView, EpikOne's two general public apps
Built DigitalMIDI, a marketing communications dashboard for enterprise
Extensive development using the Google Analytics API
General Mac desktop support and technology consulting
Created the EpikOne.com website using standards-based XHTML and CSS

positions.title: HTML Production
duties: Developer of standards-based HTML and CSS, and PHP sites ranging from simple brochure sites to high-end e-commerce
Web site production, development, and maintenance of over 30 sites
Translation of designs from Photoshop into HTML and CSS
Research of new technologies for use on future projects, such as Ajax and Ruby on Rails
Helped develop Content Creator, a CMS system for sites that allows clients to build out the content of a site themselves
